main event: A UFO sighting was reported over the Hawaiian Islands on April 7, 1960.
interesting points: The object had bright blue and red colors and a blue tail approximately 10 degrees long., The object was estimated to be around 105 feet long and disappeared to the size of a dime., The object was seen at an altitude of 300 to 400 feet and disappeared in seconds., The sighting was recorded using ground radar., The report concluded the object could be a balloon, aircraft, or satellite, but was insufficient for definite evaluation.
sighted object: an elongated, cigar-shaped object with a bright blue and red body and a blue tail
witness description: the witness reported bright blue and red objects with blue tail-like appendages
